authenticated.Name: Authenticated
authenticated.Description: This group applies to any authenticated user

everyone.Name: Everyone
everyone.Description: This group applies to any user, regardless of if they are logged in or not

security-assessment-admins.Name: Security Assessment Admins
security-assessment-admins.Description: This group gives users access to manage the Security Assessment and Threat Actor configuration

assessment-reporting.Name: Assessment Reporting
assessment-reporting.Description: This group gives users access to the Assessment Reporting page
